data.title: Drag and drop to complete the below sentences.
data.text:
We *smell* with our nose. 
 We *see* with our eyes. 
  We *hear* with our ears. 
  We *taste* with our tongue. 
  We *touch* with our hands.

data.title: Match Animals with their dwelling regions.
data.text:
Desert, Camel 
 Farm, Cow 
 Ocean, Whale 
 Pond, Fish 
 Forest, Lion 
 Iceland, Penguin
